sentences.sContent: The benefit is that one can build up the theory of correctness provable compiler easily.
sentences.sContent_eng: The benefit is that one can build up the theory of correctness provable compiler easily.
sentences.sCn: 这样处理的好处是便于构造正确性可证明的编译器设计的理论基础。

sentences.sContent: Monkeys, apparently, offer one another fleas at times, but not in any provable spirit of kindliness.
sentences.sContent_eng: Monkeys, apparently, offer one another fleas at times, but not in any provable spirit of kindliness.
sentences.sCn: 猴子似乎有时互相帮助捉跳蚤，但是这并不在任何可以证明的善意的范畴内。

words.tran: 证明地；可查验地；试验得出地
证明；检验；表现出；钻探（prove的过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 可证明的； 可查明的
